span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每當事件發生時，直到您移除委派，會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate. 如需有關委派的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
